page.title: 10SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
THE SUPERNATURAL OF CHIDEOCK.
In the church tower in Chideock there is a supposed white ghost of a man. Chimneys Guest House on certain nights a woman dressed in a white maids uniform walks along the landing, from downstairs you can hear the creaks of the floorboards. There have been many sightings of this ghost as it is the most popular ghost. Shepherd Field there is not much information on this ghost. It is supposed to be a shepherd walking round the fields. Quar Hill There is a man who was a worker down the Quarry. He drives around in his cart pulled by horses at night. People have said they have heard the cart rattling and tracks
